TopicTitle: MPLs should be able to have "Transmit Science" assignable to an action group.

Articles.Content: It seems really weird to me that you can't. Also can't assign "Clean Experiments." Both of which I think are the most useful things to have assigned to action groups for the part.

Considering how crazily effective the MPL is for generating nearly infinite science, adding those to action groups would be a bit too convenient for my liking and would be one step away from a fully automated ‘launch this and farm science to complete the tech tree five times over’ module.

You're right that one or two MPLs around either of Kerbin's moons can just finish the tech tree. In that case, I feel that two clicks versus one button press is a very marginal difference. 

My interest is in stuff like this, far beyond the completion of the tech tree.

Looks like this was suggested back in 2018...

It seems like certain part actions have been arbitrarily left out of the action group assignment system. Surface scanners, for example, can't scan the surface using an action group... instead you have to play "track down the tiny click target" every time you explore a new biome.
